title: Episode 756 - Special Guest Adam Ray
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by comedian and actor Adam Ray from the ‘About Last Night’ podcast to talk about the standup life, Tom Brady and how much dong he hangs, Adam’s story about rushing the stage at ‘The Price is Right’ when he was i...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by comedian and actor Adam Ray from the ‘About Last Night’ podcast to talk about the standup life, Tom Brady and how much dong he hangs, Adam’s story about rushing the stage at ‘The Price is Right’ when he was in college, how racist Papa John is, flying private and touring with Dane Cook — plus Adam’s new show on NBC ‘Young Rock’ about The Rock as a kid.
